evidenceData: The client signed the contract on 01/05/2025, committing to deliver 100 units of software by 01/07/2025. The deliverables were incomplete, with 30% of the modules failing unit testing. Repeated reminders were sent to the vendor, but no remediation plan was provided. Payment of $50,000 was withheld due to non-compliance with contract terms. Multiple breaches are evident, including missed deadlines and substandard quality.
